This stunning town residence is the ideal proposition for those seeking generously proportioned accommodation without the ongoing maintenance of a large garden block. The remaining 2 bedrooms are located upstairs, sharing use of the homes central bathroom.
On the lower level, theres a remote controlled double garage with internal entry; this is accessed from the rear of the property. Adjacent is an expansive room which has a multitude of uses that can change with your needs across lifes different cycles.
